title: [K-12] Relational Small-Group Discussion Design to Enhance Accessibility and Equity in Online Teacher Training Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic online learning tools and foundational knowledge of language education
context.additional_context: Conducted in a digital device-provided setting, emphasizing deep learning environments through relationship-building and strengthened community consciousness among learners.

learning_goals: Learners can perform interaction strategies with learners from diverse backgrounds through small-group online discussions with over 80% participation rate.
Learners can design three teaching methodologies reflecting cultural diversity in educational settings through relationship-centered discussion activities.
Learners can develop two accessibility improvement strategies and fairness verification tools through project-based assessment.

resources: LMS System (Discussion Board, Group Management Features)
Journaling template for reflective thinking facilitation

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
